Detailed Description

Extends the abstract item-grid to allow traversing a hierarchical menu shown as a tree-view. A menu is defined by an instance of the class ItemContainer, which may contain a variable number of items. As an ItemContainer is also an instance of the class Item, it is possible to recursively embedd item-containers inside other item-containers, which leads to a hierarchical item-tree.

const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id
) 
 

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.

Reimplemented from AbstractItemGrid.

BOOLEAN ItemTree::Trigger (  INT  index = -1  )  [virtual]
 

This method must be invoked to trigger an item (e. g. ItemMenu::Trigger may get invoked by pressing a softkey). Per default the selected item is triggered. If the item is an instance of the class Action, the action will be executed. If the item is an instance of the class AbstractItemContainer, the item-menu will be opened as sub-tree (or closed if it was openend before).

Parameters:
index Index of the item which should get triggered. If the index is < 0, the selected item is triggered.
